faqs.q: How many calories in a mug of black coffee?
faqs.a: Only about 2 kcal for a standard 240 ml mug.

faqs.q: Does black coffee have any carbs or protein?
faqs.a: Negligible—0 g carbs and 0.1 g protein per mug.
Yes, 0 g fat, including no saturated or trans fats.

faqs.q: How does adding milk change calories in black coffee?
faqs.a: 1 tbsp whole milk adds ~9 kcal; skim milk adds less (~5 kcal).

faqs.q: Why is sodium in black coffee?
faqs.a: Trace amounts from water and beans, about 5 mg per mug.
